string.value: You need to make the #t4032334# again. You know #b#p2060005##k in the #b#m230000003# of #m230000000##k sells this so you'd better go see #p2060005# for another #t4032335#.

Simply put…#b100 million mesos#k. Are you sure you want to buy one?

Really? Really? I can't believe there's someone out there that would actually spend 100 million mesos! That's amazing! Wait, I shouldn't act like this. Okay, please bring 100 million mesos with you, then I'll have the #t4032335# ready immediately.
100 million mesos IS too much, right? That's totally understandable. Hahaha… if you have a change of heart, let me know.
Wow… you really did bring 100 million mesos! Wow, that's amazing! Okay, take this right now!
Thanks to you, the #m230000003# is no longer in trouble. Wait, we can even expand now! Thank you so much!

Do you have enough to cover #b100 million mesos#k? I mean, even someone like you would have a hard time justifying that fee…but I still believe that you can come up with it somehow. Haha… I'll be waiting right here!
